text: Mónica Luiza Miguel (13 March 1936 – 12 August 2020) was a Mexican actress, telenovela director and singer. She was born in Tepic, Nayarit. She was known for her acting roles in I Dream in Another Language, Más allá del puente and Under Fire. She directed episodes of Teresa. Miguel died on 12 August 2020 in Mexico City from cancer-related problems, aged 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Mexican movie directors Category:Mexican television directors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Cancer deaths in Mexico Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Nayarit
title: Mónica Miguel
